Title: Beautiful Wedding
Based on: A Beautiful Wedding by  Jamie McGuire
Produced by:
Brian Pitt 
 David Shojai 
 Roger Kumble 
 Nicolas Chartier 
 Jonathan Deckter
Starring:
Dylan Sprouse 
 Virginia Gardner 
 Austin North 
 Libe Barer 
 Steven Bauer 
 Alex Aiono 
 Rob Estes 
 Kyle Richards
Production: In September 2023, it was announced that the sequel to 2023's Beautiful Disaster  titled Beautiful Wedding was set to be released. Roger Kumble returned to direct along with the main cast also returning. Principal photography took place at the end of 2022 in the Dominican Republic.
Release: Like with the first film, Beautiful Wedding was released in the United States in limited theaters by Fathom Events for two nights starting January 24, 2024.  The film was released on digital platforms by Vertical Entertainment on February 13, 2024.
